com.millennialmedia.android
Interface MMAdView.MMAdListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
BasicMMAdListener
Enclosing class:
MMAdView
public static interface MMAdView.MMAdListener

Listener for the ad view. The MMAdListener methods provide notice to the application that certain events occurred within the SDK.

Method Summary
 void MMAdCachingCompleted(MMAdView adview, boolean success)
          This method is called after a cached ad download has completed or failed.
 void MMAdClickedToNewBrowser(MMAdView adview)
          This method is called when an ad is clicked and a new browser is launched to handle the click.
 void MMAdClickedToOverlay(MMAdView adview)
          This method is called when an ad is clicked and a new overlay activity is launched to handle the click.
 void MMAdFailed(MMAdView adView)
          This method is called when an ad call fails to return an ad.
 void MMAdOverlayLaunched(MMAdView adview)
          This method is called when an ad overlay is automatically launched.
 void MMAdRequestIsCaching(MMAdView adview)
          This method is called after an ad request has receives instructions for a cached ad and the download is in progress.
 void MMAdReturned(MMAdView adView)
          This method is called when an ad is successfully returned.
 

Method Detail

MMAdCachingCompleted

void MMAdCachingCompleted(MMAdView adview,
                          boolean success)
This method is called after a cached ad download has completed or failed.

Parameters:
adview - The MMAdView downloading a cached ad.
success - This indicates whether the ad was successfully cached or not. If true, the cached ad is ready to be shown.

MMAdClickedToNewBrowser

void MMAdClickedToNewBrowser(MMAdView adview)
This method is called when an ad is clicked and a new browser is launched to handle the click.

Parameters:
adview - The MMAdView clicked.

MMAdClickedToOverlay

void MMAdClickedToOverlay(MMAdView adview)
This method is called when an ad is clicked and a new overlay activity is launched to handle the click.

Parameters:
adview - The MMAdView clicked.

MMAdFailed

void MMAdFailed(MMAdView adView)
This method is called when an ad call fails to return an ad.

Parameters:
adView - The MMAdView that failed to return an ad.

MMAdOverlayLaunched

void MMAdOverlayLaunched(MMAdView adview)
This method is called when an ad overlay is automatically launched.

Parameters:
adview - The MMAdView launched.

MMAdRequestIsCaching

void MMAdRequestIsCaching(MMAdView adview)
This method is called after an ad request has receives instructions for a cached ad and the download is in progress. Before being show, a cached ad first needs to be downloaded. After the cached ad has been downloaded completely it can be shown on a later ad call or refresh.

Parameters:
adview - The MMAdView downloading a cached ad.

MMAdReturned

void MMAdReturned(MMAdView adView)
This method is called when an ad is successfully returned.

Parameters:
adView - The MMAdView that returned an ad.
